name: Quick Whois
author: Faster Themes

sections.description:
Quick Whois WordPress Plugin Shows whois information of the provided domain name. You can use Widget in the sidebar or you can also use Shortcode in the pages/posts.

DEMO of Quick Whois plugin

Features:

  • You can use this plugin in your sidebar by dragging and dropping “Quick Whois” Widget.
  • You can use this in any specific page/post by putting shortcode [quick_whois].
  • This plugin converts your website into a whois data provider website in a few seconds !

License and Copyrights for Resources used in this plugin

i) We have used phpwhois.org php script from this website http://www.phpwhois.org Copyright which is a free software and we are allowed to redistribute it and/or
modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License v2.

For any help you can mail us at support[at]fasterthemes.com
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin file through the WordPress interface.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to Appearance -> Widgets and you’ll see “Quick Whois” Widget. You can drag and drop that into your sidebar
    or you can use short code [quick_whois] on a page/post.
sections.faq:
Q.1 : Can I check .co.in or other country TLDs.

Answer : Yes. You can !

screenshots.caption: screenshot-1.png shows how the input box will look on your website.
screenshot-2.png shows how the result will be shown after you hit "GET DATA" button.
screenshot-3.png shows how the result will be shown after you hit "GET DATA" button and domain name is not registered.
screenshot-4.png shows how the widget will appear after you install the plugin.
